title: Wifee
lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh, yeah, uh-huh-uh
[Verse 1]
I never thought it, that I would be waking up with you on me
The love we be making, then drinking coffee
While them records be playing and you sing 'em to me
Uh-huh-uh, never thought it
That I'd be the type making bank deposits
That joint account with your last name on it
But baby this life is the shit we wanted, uh-huh-uh
[Pre-Chorus]
But I, I was made for you
Baby and you always knew
Look at how the universe came through, oh, baby
[Chorus]
I be in your white tee every night
Baby hit the lights come and hold me tight
I know that you like me, causе you call me wifey
I'm all in your white tee
I bе in your white tee every night
Baby hit the lights come and hold me tight
I know that you like me, cause you call me wifey
I'm all in your white tee

[Verse 2]
I never thought it, that we'd be the type
Holding hands and shopping
Then we unpack the bags and we sharing closets
Then we hop into bed, get my makeup on you, oh
So baby, how'd we get this way?
I ain't trying to be cliche, oh, I
I'm happy as fuck all the time, boy
[Pre-Chorus]
But I, I was made for you
Baby yeah, you always knew
Look at how the universe came through, oh, baby
[Chorus]
I be in your white tee every night
Baby hit the lights come and hold me tight
I know that you like me, cause you call me wifey
I'm all in your white tee
I be in your white tee every night
Baby hit the lights come and hold me tight
I know that you like me, cause you call me wifey
I'm all in your white tee
